product_description: Eclectic Herb Vitamin Herb Blend vita biotic dietary supplement, 750mg, 150 capsules per plastic bottle, UPC 0 23363 52002 2. Eclectic Institute, Inc. 755 NE 6th Street Gresham, OR 97030.  The affected label declared "Oregon Grape 190mg ***Oregon Grape 97mg***Cayenne Root (Allium sativum) 195mg ***Ginger Fruit (Capsicum annuum) 65mg***".
reason_for_recall: Product's ingredients names such as Oregon Grape, Cayenne Root, and Ginger Fruit and their quantities were not listed correctly in the Supplement Facts panel.
